recipesJson.name: My Golden Ticket
recipesJson.author: NastyNate
recipesJson.description: My version of the infamous “golden ticket” someday a company will release an actual chocolate we can work with, but this fits the bill for now. Enjoy friends!

reviews.text: Good stuff. Chocolate is tough to balance well but you manage it with delicious effect here.
Temperature unclear, bottle vaprized in my smelting furnace.
